extension-point.name: init/workbench
extension-point.description: Initializes some properties before anything else (acts in place of the workbench).

extension-point.name: init/context
extension-point.description: Initializes some context such as Class availability etc.

extension-point.name: init/execution
extension-point.description: Initializes launch according to context and application.

extension-point.name: init/finalization
extension-point.description: Computes final values of the 'overall.*' properties given to tools (S3, SOAR, etc.)

extension-point.name: dyninit/workbench
extension-point.description: Same as init/workbench for dynamic download launches.

extension-point.name: dyninit/context
extension-point.description: Same as init/context for dynamic download launches.

extension-point.name: dyninit/execution
extension-point.description: Same as init/execution for dynamic download launches.

extension-point.name: dyninit/finalization
extension-point.description: Same as init/finalization for dynamic download launches.
